title: List of new things that suck horrendously
body:
1) The new SR map
2) Jungle/play passage changes
3) Boards
4) Team builder
5) Active forum mods 

Dear Riot, stop fixing things that aren't broken you bloated, overstaffed conglomerate of hoodie-and-sneaker-wearing hipster nerds.

Sincerely,

Corki did 911

replies.body:
Embraces the changes, young one.

If you cannot adapt you will die.

1) The new SR map
2) Jungle/play passage changes
3) Boards
4) Team builder
5) Active forum mods

The New SR map is great
The Jungle changes are for those who can adapt around it (I don't need to :P)
The Boards are actually better than the Forums. What it lacks now is a proper 'GD'
The Team Builder thing is actually not that bad, it's just normals takes less queue time
The active forum mods won't annoy you if you're not doing anything wrong...

I attached a wallpaper of Ahri to cheer you up :3

For the record, the new SR is cool.

And Team Builder is nearly cool.

i agree with everything , but this is still qq

mods not active?, awesome 
versace versace, eshays lad on my head like im luminarty
